# Sisif AI Video Generator

> Sisif is a text-to-video SaaS platform that transforms text prompts into stunning AI-generated videos. Built for content creators, marketers, and businesses, Sisif offers instant video generation for social media, marketing, and creative projects.

Sisif leverages cutting-edge AI technology to create professional-quality videos from simple text descriptions. Whether you need content for TikTok, Instagram Stories, YouTube Shorts, or business presentations, Sisif delivers in seconds. The platform offers 15 free credits to start, with subscription plans for regular creators.

## Core Features

- [Video Creation](https://sisif.ai/app/): Generate AI videos from text prompts - the main creation interface
- [Featured Videos](https://sisif.ai/featured/): Showcase of community-created AI videos demonstrating platform capabilities
- [Dream Creator](https://sisif.ai/dream/): Create surreal, artistic AI-generated dream videos from imagination
- [Video Library](https://sisif.ai/app/library/): Access and manage all your generated videos in one place

## Use Cases & Applications

- [Social Media Marketing](https://sisif.ai/use-cases/social-media-marketing/): Create viral content for TikTok, Instagram, and social campaigns
- [Travel Videos](https://sisif.ai/use-cases/travel-videos/): Generate stunning destination videos for tourism marketing
- [TikTok Videos](https://sisif.ai/use-cases/tiktok-videos/): Specialized viral content creation for TikTok creators
- [Instagram Stories](https://sisif.ai/use-cases/instagram-stories/): Eye-catching story content for Instagram engagement
- [YouTube Shorts](https://sisif.ai/use-cases/youtube-shorts/): Short-form video content optimized for YouTube

## Showcase Gallery

### Travel Destinations

- [Italy Travel Videos](https://sisif.ai/showcases/travel-ai-video-italy/): AI-generated videos of Rome, Venice, Florence, and Italian destinations
- [Paris Travel Videos](https://sisif.ai/showcases/travel-ai-video-paris/): Stunning Parisian landmarks from Eiffel Tower to Louvre
- [New York City Videos](https://sisif.ai/showcases/travel-ai-video-nyc/): NYC&#x27;s iconic skyline, Times Square, and Central Park
- [Japan Travel Videos](https://sisif.ai/showcases/travel-ai-video-japan/): Traditional temples, Mount Fuji, and Japanese culture

### Business & Lifestyle

- [Business Marketing](https://sisif.ai/showcases/business-marketing-videos/): Professional corporate content for B2B marketing
- [Food &amp; Restaurant](https://sisif.ai/showcases/food-restaurant-videos/): Culinary content for restaurants and food brands
- [Fitness &amp; Wellness](https://sisif.ai/showcases/fitness-wellness-videos/): Health and fitness content for gyms and trainers
- [TikTok Stock Videos](https://sisif.ai/showcases/tiktok-stock-videos/): Ready-to-use viral content for TikTok creators

## Platform Information

- [Pricing](https://sisif.ai/pricing/): Subscription plans starting at $10/month, with 15 free credits for new users
- [API Access](https://sisif.ai/api/): Developer API for programmatic video generation

## Account & Support

- [Sign Up](https://sisif.ai/accounts/signup/): Create free account with 15 video generation credits
- [Login](https://sisif.ai/accounts/login/): Access your account and video library
- [Support Center](https://sisif.ai/support/): Help documentation and contact support team
- [Subscription Management](https://sisif.ai/subscriptions/): Manage your plan and billing

## Technical Details

- **Video Generation**: RunPod AI integration for fast, high-quality video rendering
- **Video Formats**: MP4 format optimized for all social media platforms
- **Video Duration**: 3-15 second clips perfect for social media
- **Languages**: Full support for English and Spanish
- **API**: RESTful API with authentication for developers

## Key Benefits

- **Instant Generation**: Videos ready in seconds, not hours
- **No Equipment Needed**: No cameras, actors, or editing software required
- **Social Media Optimized**: Perfect dimensions and formats for all platforms
- **Creative Freedom**: Any scene, any style, any concept imaginable
- **Cost Effective**: Fraction of traditional video production costs

## Common Prompts

- "Aerial view of tropical beach with crystal clear water"
- "Modern office with people working on computers"
- "Chef preparing gourmet dish in professional kitchen"
- "Yoga instructor in peaceful mountain setting"
- "Futuristic city skyline at night with neon lights"
- "Product showcase with elegant lighting and motion"
